group_1.textRight: Aaah!

group_1.textLeft: Whoa! [chara:200300:effect_shake][chara:300800:effect_shake][chara:300800:lipSynch_0][wait:1][chara:300800:cheek_0][chara:300800:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:300800:lipSynch_1]...You okay?

group_1.textRight: Thanks... You stopped me from falling over.

group_1.textLeft: It's pretty dark out here. I better be@careful too.

group_1.textRight: Right? And there's trash everywhere.

group_1.textLeft: The main road is much better lit, but this@shortcut allows us to keep a low profile.
It's not the ideal place to walk, but follow@along and try not to get lost.

group_1.textRight: Not only did you bring me to the@Coordinator...
But now you're showing us the way to the@heliport. We keep causing you trouble...
I'm very sorry.

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry about it. We need to help each@other out at times like this.
That's right. We were on our way back@anyway.
There's a chance that the battle may still@be raging at the heliport.
The more firepower we have with us,@the better.

group_1.textRight: Did you have to put it like that?

group_1.textLeft: This may not be something that you wish@to speak about, but...
We have some things to ask you.
About the three Magical Girls governing the@Wings of the Magius.
The ones who are the ringleaders behind all@this turmoil.
Mami...

group_1.textRight: It's fine.
I'll answer any questions you have as best@I can.

group_1.textLeft: I am much obliged.

group_1.textRight: What do you want to know?

group_1.textLeft: We heard from the Coordinator about what@their ideals appear to be.
But no matter how lofty the ideals they put@forth...
If they use unjust means to accomplish them,@people are sure to lose faith in them.
And yet...
Up until now, the Wings of the Magius have@not imploded. They've continued on.
Is that merely proof of how much the Feathers@trust them?

group_1.textRight: To be quite honest, I don't think they trust@the Magius.
Even if they had faith in their abilities, @they didn't trust them as individuals.
The one the Feathers trusted was a Magical@Girl named Mifuyu Azusa.

group_1.textLeft: Mifuyu... Azusa... She's a veteran Magical@Girl in Kamihama.
I see. In that case, I can understand.

group_1.textRight: (I was revered as a saint, but they didn't@trust me either.)
(If Mifuyu spoke to them, she might get@through, but I don't know if I can...)
(Even so...)
I have to do this.
I'm going to tell the Feathers.
About the Magius's true intentions, and what@they've been doing.
That is what I must do as someone who was@complicit as the "Saint of Salvation".
That's what I believe.

group_1.textLeft: So, you're going to take responsibility.
But the [textBlue:Rumor] was what made you do it...

group_1.textRight: Even so, I can't erase what I did.
(No matter what sort of criticism I face,@I must accept all of it.)
(If I don't...)
(Then there's no way I can ever face those@three who called me their ally again.)

group_1.textLeft: Um... Mami, we...
All right, we're here. It's on top of this@building.
There may still be fighting going on.

group_1.textRight: Yes. Let's all proceed carefully.
We don't need words. Let's show her how@we feel with our actions!

group_1.textLeft: I just know it will be all right! Let's go,@Madoka.
